name: Avoid unreferenced PHP Files (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all unreferenced files supported by PHP extension.
output:
This report lists all unreferenced PHP Files.

This QR provides the following information:
File full name.
rationale:
Unreferenced code may be a symptom of Dead Code. Dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of software maintenance.

Warning:
Unreferenced code can also be an indication of missing code (code referring to the file not included in the source code analysis).
remediation: Review the source code to reduce the number of unreferenced files.

qualityStandards.name: Unreachable Named Callable or Method Control Element
